name: Gnomish Dreams
description:
This game was made in 3 days for The Mini Jam 85 GOLD, and oh boy is it a treat to play. 

Made by two people from different sides of the world they certainly had a ton of fun making it. This Jam theme was gold mind you ;) so we went with the idea that you control a little gnome in a platformer trying to locate his stolen gold. Since that was a bit hard to do, the guy shoots gold from a bagpipe. Hope the Game will bring you joy and pain. 

Controls

Arrow Keys to move, Control to shoot and Spacebar to jump.

By psznm

Art By Auto description by me hehe
